loghub.netty.servers

Class AbstractNettyServer<CF extends ComponentFactory<BS,BSC,SA>,BS extends io.netty.bootstrap.AbstractBootstrap<BS,BSC>,BSC extends io.netty.channel.Channel,SC extends io.netty.channel.Channel,SA extends SocketAddress>

  • java.lang.Object
    • loghub.netty.servers.AbstractNettyServer<CF,BS,BSC,SC,SA>
  • Type Parameters:
    CF - ComponentFactory
    BS - BootStrap (Bootstrap, ServerBootstrap)
    BSC - Bootstrap's channel (Channel or ServerChannel)
    SC - Server channel
    SA - Socket Address
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    TcpServer, UdpServer
